Text:
Sk4nZ Presente : SkZ-Nero_Multimedia_10              

            Release : Nero Multimedia Suite 10.0.13                     
            Compagnie : Nero                                            
            Genre : Gravure/Burner                                      
            Langue : MULTI FR/EN/ES                                     
            Date de release : 07/2010                                   
            Date de sortie : 04/2010                                    



                                Description :                           

                                    FR:                                 

        Nero Multimedia Suite 10 augmente vos possibilites multimedia   
        avec une collection de trois produits regroupes dans une        
        suite puissante. Elle comporte de nombreuses fonctions          
        avancees d'edition video, un organiseur et lecteur              
        multimedia, un logiciel de gravure de qualite superieure, une   
        technologie de sauvegarde tres fiable, et des outils            
        multimedia speciaux permettant de mettre en valeur votre        
        musique, vos photos et vos videos.                              

                                    EN:                                 

        Nero Multimedia Suite 10 excels your multimedia power with a    
        collection of three products bundled into one powerful suite.   
        It's loaded with advanced video editing features, media         
        organizer and player, superior burning software, reliable       
        backup technology, and special multimedia tools to enhance      
        your music, photos and videos.                                  



                               Installation :                           
                                    FR:                                 

        1) Installer Nero Multimedia Suite 10 a partir de               
        "Nero-10.0.13100_trial.exe". Attention, pendant cette           
        installation, une cle demo est deja presente, NE PAS LA         
        MODIFIER.                                                       

        2) Une fois l'installation terminee, lancer "Nero               
        ControlCenter" et ajouter l'une des deux cles suivantes dans    
        l'onglet "Numeros de serie" :                                   

            9X03-0154-4H84-WWPL-1WPZ-AP64-K532-XMML                     
                     ou                                                 
            9X03-016C-MXEX-4536-T0L7-2W2T-AMPX-97TA                     

                                    EN:                                 

        1) Install Nero Multimedia Suite 10 from                        
        "Nero-10.0.13100_trial.exe. Attention during this               
        installation, a key demo is already present, DO NOT MODIFY.
It tells me i need to install .NET Framework that i already have. then it tells me it failed and wont install.

Worked perfect.  If for some reason there some type of error.  Just uninstall and reinstall and when it shows a demo key(serial number) don't bother that number and go with the install process.  Restart then follow instructions then a pop up will come up and click to add product key.  Then click add on the other popup and then add the  serial that sk4nz has for that language.  

again thanks sk4nz!
installed proply but cant use anything unless you prove that the activation key is good and when you try they know its not and you cant do shit with the program
I just installed this, the only problem I ran into was the second serial number didn't work.  The first number worked fine though
the serials written in the first comment are not the same in both language thats why joezta
